lyrics.text: beg me cry for me mabey my heart will feel sorry for you
believe me it's not in my hands that my heart is hard on you (x2)
from you sapertion i beacome hard with no feeling
from your sapertion i walked counturies
away from you and your heart i saw tortuer from your love
if you miss me and you think your gana come bake to me
than come on drink from the same galss you have to taste tortuer a little (x2)
believe me i didn't want to hurt you but when my heart saw you it didn't feel you
if you accpet it i wont accpet coem bake again and you wont perciate (x2)
from you sapertion i beacome hard with no feeling
from your sapertion i walked counturies
away from you and your heart i saw tortuer from your love
if you miss me and you think your gana come bake to me
than come on drink from the same galss you have to taste tortuer a little (x2)
beg me cry for me mabey my heart will feel sorry for you
believe me it's not in my hands that my heart is hard on you (x2)
اترجينى ابكى عليا يمكن قلبى يحن عليكى
صدقينى مش بأيديا ان انا قلبى بيقسى عليكى
اترجينى ابكى عليا يمكن قلبى يحن عليكى
صدقينى مش بأيديا ان انا قلبى بيقسى عليكى
من قساكى قسايا زاد من بعادك مشيت بلاد
بعيد عنك وعن قلبك دا ياما شوفت فى هواكى عذاب
لو خلاص مشتاقه ليا وفاكره ان انتى راجعه ليا
طب يلا بقى من نفس الكأس لازم تذوقى العذاب شويه

لو ترضيها انا عن نفسى ميرضنيش ارجع تانى واحبك انتى متقضريش
